6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Musa in a Marfu' [1] report:"Wait until it cools down to pray Zuhr, for the heat you experience is a breeze from Hell." [1] Meaning he attributed it to the Prophet (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِبْرَادِ بِالظُّهْرِ إِذَا اشْتَدَّ الْحَرُّ .
chapter.eng-name: Waiting To Pray Zuhr until It Cools Down When It Is Hot
